dublinCore.dc:title: 113 SRES 285 ATS: Authorizing the Committee on Rules and Administration to prepare a revised edition of the Standing Rules of the Senate as a Senate document.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Schumer submitted the following resolution; which was considered and agreed to

form.official-title: Authorizing the Committee on Rules and Administration to prepare a revised edition of the Standing Rules of the Senate as a Senate document.

section.header: Printing the standing rules of the Senate

subsection.text: The Committee on Rules and Administration shall prepare a revised edition of the Standing Rules of the Senate and such standing rules shall be printed as a Senate document.
In addition to the usual number, 1,750 additional copies shall be printed for use by the Committee on Rules and Administration.
